Description_lang: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability in Cat Form by $s1 and increases the threat generated by your Mangle ability in Bear Form by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability in Cat Form by 5 and increases the threat generated by your Mangle ability in Bear Form by 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce el costo de energía de tu facultad Triturar bajo Forma felina 5 p. y aumenta la amenaza generada por tu facultad Destrozar bajo Forma de oso un 15%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 5 o custo de energia da habilidade Despedaçar sob a Forma de Felino e aumenta em 15% a ameaça gerada pela sua habilidade Destroçar sob a Forma de Urso.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Energiekosten Eurer Fähigkeit 'Schreddern' in Katzengestalt um 5 und erhöht die durch Eure Fähigkeit 'Zerfleischen' erzeugte Bedrohung in Bärengestalt um 15%.
description_blz.en_GB: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability in Cat Form by 5 and increases the threat generated by your Mangle ability in Bear Form by 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce el coste de energía de tu facultad Triturar en Forma felina 5 p. y aumenta la amenaza generada por tu facultad Destrozar en Forma de oso un 15%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le coût en énergie de votre technique Lambeau en forme de félin de 5 points et augmente la menace générée par votre technique Mutilation en forme d’ours de 15%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il costo in energia di Artigliata in Forma Felina di 5 e aumenta la minaccia generata da Dilaniamento in Forma d'Orso del 15%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает расход энергии на использование способности "Полоснуть" в облике кошки на 5 ед. и увеличивает угрозу, создаваемую способностью "Увечье" в облике медведя, на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 표범 변신 시 칼날 발톱에 소비되는 기력이 5만큼 감소하고, 곰 변신 시 짓이기기로 생성되는 위협 수준이 15%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 降低撕碎(獵豹形態)的能量消耗5點，並且提高割碎(熊形態)所產生的威脅值15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你在猎豹形态下的撕碎技能所消耗的能量值减少5点，在熊形态下的裂伤技能所造成的威胁值提高15%。
